results.description: Frenchman Nicolas Dupuis signs a new four-year deal to continue as coach of Madagascar.
results.shortTitle: French coach Dupuis extends Madagascar deal
results.title: Frenchman Nicolas Dupuis signs new deal as Madagascar coach

results.description: Nicolas Dupuis admits that he is not sure about his future as coach of Madagascar after his contract ended on 31 July.
results.title: Nicolas Dupuis' future as Madagascar coach unclear

results.description: Tunisia reach their first Africa Cup of Nations semi-final since 2004 as they end Madagascar's fairytale run with a 3-0 win.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Tunisia end Madagascar's Afcon run with 3-0 win

results.description: Four teams but only two semi-final spots remain - what can we expect on day 21 at the Africa Cup of Nations in Egypt?
results.shortTitle: Day 21 at Africa Cup of Nations
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: What to look out for on day 21 in Egypt

thumbnail.altText: Madagascar fans celebrate at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: Africa Cup of Nations debutants Madagascar produce another upset to beat DR Congo 4-2 on penalties and secure a quarter-final spot.
results.shortTitle: Madagascar shock DR Congo at Afcon
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Madagascar 2-2 DR Congo (Madagascar win 4-2 on pens)

thumbnail.altText: Madagascar's players celebrate scoring against DR Congo at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: Holders Cameroon are out after losing to Nigeria in the Africa Cup of Nations on Saturday, but can minnows Madagascar cause another upset on day 17?
results.shortTitle: Day 17 at Africa Cup of Nations
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: What to look out for on day 17 in Egypt

thumbnail.altText: Madagascar's Lalaina Nomenjanahary celebrates scoring at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: Nigerian fans are stunned after the Super Eagles lose to Afcon debutants Madagascar.
results.shortTitle: Nigeria fans react to Madagascar loss
results.title: Afcon 2019: Nigeria fans mourn defeat to Madagascar

results.description: Madagascar produce the biggest shock so far at the Africa Cup of Nations as they beat three-time winners Nigeria to go into the last 16 as group winners.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Madagascar 2-0 Nigeria

thumbnail.altText: Lalaina Nomenjanahary celebrates scoring for Madagascar against Nigeria

results.description: Madagascar beat Nigeria & Guinea are winners against Burundi in the final round of Group B games at the 2019 African Cup of Nations.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Madagascar win group & qualify with Nigeria

results.description: Marco Ilaimaharitra's thunderous free-kick gives Madagascar their first Africa Cup of Nations win by beating Burundi.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Madagascar edge 1-0 victory over Burundi
